snippet: The Carolina Panthers’ Pro Bowl defensive end Greg Hardy was arrested on misdemeanor charges of assault and communicating threats, the police in Charlotte, N.C., said.
abstract: Carolina Panthers defensive end Greg Hardy is arrested on misdemeanor charges after woman reports that he physically assaulted and threatened her.
